comment: A note applicable for this experience product.
A note applicable to this guest person.
A specified note applicable for this experience event.
A specified note applicable to this trade price.

rangeIncludes.comment: A specified textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.

domainIncludes.comment: An involvement in an experience program in which some thing happens, such as a nature watching, woodware manufacturing, meditation, holiday trip, dinner, theme park visit, could be experienced.
Any service that provides an involvement, such as an adventure experience, wellness experience, social or business activity experience.
A sum of money for which something is or may be bought or sold for trade purposes.
